Interface NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinition<ParentT>

  • Type Parameters:
    ParentT - the return type of the final Attachable.attach()

    public static interface NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinition<ParentT>
extends NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.Blank<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithDirectionAccess<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithSourceAddress<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithSourcePort<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithDestinationAddress<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithDestinationPort<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithProtocol<ParentT>, NetworkSecurityRule.UpdateDefinables.WithAttach<ParentT>
    The entirety of a network security rule definition as part of a network security group update.
